name: Sebor's Nightmare
flavorText: Sebor's Nightmare can easily make the difference between staying in this land or passing on to the next. For, though highly unlikely, the opening of a chest can have dire results on occasion.
flavorTextHtml: Sebor's Nightmare can easily make the difference between staying in this land or passing on to the next. For, though highly unlikely, the opening of a chest can have dire results on occasion.

secondary.textHtml: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.
secondary.text: Increases Gold and Health Pickup by [1 - 2] Yards.

secondary.textHtml: Haunt is cast on all nearby enemies when you open a chest.
secondary.text: Haunt is cast on all nearby enemies when you open a chest.
